attributes.action: Fund research into any effects of COVID vaccines on the menstrual cycle
attributes.additional_details:
Government-funded research into this issue should help put women's mind at ease, as well as identify any issues that may need action.
 
Research should look at whether vaccination against COVID, including booster doses, effect menstruation, and if so whether this has any implications for fertility.
attributes.background: There have been a large number of reports of changes to periods and unexpected vaginal bleeding after being vaccinated against COVID. The Government should fund research to establish whether COVID vaccines do effect menstruation, and if so, how.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dame Rosie Winterton MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Doncaster Central
